about_the_game:
Monsters NPC Dice Pack Volume 2

Enhance your tabletop experience with the Monsters NPC Dice Pack Volume 2 . This digital dice pack features an array of thematic dice specifically designed for NPCs of various creature types. Whether they're rolling for attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks, or other non-damage rolls, these dice bring an immersive element to your game. Automatically linked to certain monsters, they offer seamless integration but can also be manually assigned to any monster you choose, or you can use them with monster-themed characters you create to play. Dice Included:
  • Bloodstalker
  • Shrouded
  • Brains
  • Bones
  • Moonhowl
  • Chitinous
  • Scalydoom
  • Deathmetal
  • Deeplurker
  • Avian
  • Bloodstalker Fx
  • Shrouded Fx
  • Brains Fx
  • Bones Fx
  • Moonhowl Fx
  • Chitinous Fx
  • Scalydoom Fx
  • Deathmetal Fx
  • Deeplurker Fx
  • Avian Fx
Each dice set is meticulously crafted to reflect the unique essence of the associated monster type, ensuring that your game is as engaging and visually stunning as possible. Elevate your adventures and make every roll a story with the Monsters NPC Dice Pack Volume 2.
"

Monsters NPC Dice Pack Volume 2

Enhance your tabletop experience with the Monsters NPC Dice Pack Volume 2 . This digital dice pack features an array of thematic dice specifically designed for NPCs of various creature types. Whether they're rolling for attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks, or other non-damage rolls, these dice bring an immersive element to your game. Automatically linked to certain monsters, they offer seamless integration but can also be manually assigned to any monster you choose, or you can use them with monster-themed characters you create to play.
